There is a letter that is said to have been sent by Saint (doubting) Thomas from Edessa to India:
http://www.nasrani.net/2008/09/20/letter-of-st-thomas-the-apostle-to-edessa-from-india/
The Nasranis were originally a Jewish-Christian group that settled in the state of Kerala, South India in the first century and still maintain some Jewish traditions. They now belong to the Catholic, Syro-Malabar and Syro-Malankara(Syrian-rite Catholic Churches, one cardinal each),Church of the East and Mar Thomas Churches. The Nasrani community has many websites with interesting material.
There is no tradition of any burial cloth here.
